attributes.action: Selling of SILENT fireworks only. Protect our anxious pets.
attributes.background: For the general physical and mental health of the majority of innocent animals selling of NOISE fireworks need to be banned and silent fireworks only to be sold in replacement.

rejection.details:
All fireworks make a noise, but we have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Reduce the decibel limit on fireworks to 85 decibels, to reduce impact: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/622900
